title: Riot - LeaverBuster is a complete JOKE
body: My friend  was playing some League of Legends and his ping was very high, so he disconnected and reconnected almost instantly twice and it gave him a 5 game low priority queue. The next game his internet went out so he quickly reconnected as soon as he got back on. Another 2 games for us to wait 20 minutes for a match. Then this game he didnt even disconnect but his ping was high so he afk'd for 5 minutes and now we get another 5 GOD DAMN GAMES LEAVERBUSTER IS SO HARSH ITS RIDICULOUS please undo this bullcrap. The Leaverbuster bugs out and sometimes it makes you wait another 20 minutes its VERY VERY BUGGY PLEASE FIX LEAVERTROLLER*Please read Riot Staff*

replies.body: Wait... so your friend kept entering games when he knew his internet was messing up is what you're saying?
He didnt know we just went in cuz we thought it was only 300 ping
"my friend akfed and got punished for it. i dont even know what im complaining about"
Wtf his internet went out in-game -_-

Leaverbuster is a joke, because people come on here to complain thinking they have a case, when they don't.

That's the joke.
Not really when people get banned for their crappy internet

Dude your leaving game cause of your crappy internet, then it's your fault.

THIS IS NOT A CASE.

Think about it this way.
Everyone has their own profile that accounts for their behaviour.
When they get consistent reports for abusive language, they'll get chat restrictions.
When the leave games consistently, then they'll receive LPQ's.
No one ever gets a LPQ right off 1 AFK, it's always a result from regular leaves.

--------------------------------------

If your friend is having problems with his computer, send a diagnostics report to Riot and see if they can help you sort anything out.
Support are there to actually help you with this kind of stuff.
Thanks :) Ill try it next time but the 12 games of 20 mins leaverbuster are over thank god
I would rather it be too harsh then too lenient.
Yea cuz ur not the one being banned here are you?

they acknowledged that sometimes it bugs out and makes the queue start again (see: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/QaAFVNZR-continuous-low-priority-queue), but other than that there are no problems with it
I agree, leavebuster can be good in the form of banning trollers but for all the people that leave once and join back, this bs ''leavebuster'' needs to go or be fixed.

>Leave once

It never bans someone for leaving once, or bans trolls (trolls don't afk).
Dude i went afk for about 5 mins cuz of high ping and straight after game 5 mins leaverbuster for 5 matches -_-

a) then leaverbuster is doing it's job
b) your a liar, i have left games since new leaverbuster was introduced, and i haven't gotten anything, you have left more then once.
Yea ikr thats ridiculous

The current leaver buster is waaaaay to harsh its starting to put people off playing altogether, 
i for one have spent a lot of money on my account and i don't want it banned, so as soon as that attempting to reconnect thing comes up even slightly 
thats the last game i play for the next few days, I'm not sure thats the intention riot had (just to be clear i never afk unless a tech problem makes me)
lmao.
